title: How does one live well? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on what you mean by living well. If you mean living a life of luxury, obviously you will need lots of money. However, if you are referring to a life well-lived, that involves doing something meaningful wth your life. People are remembered for what they accomplish in life, so what have you accomplished? Have you lived a life beyond yourself? How have you helped others? Have you made a difference in the lives of others? What sort of legacy will you leave behind once you are gone? To honestly be able to say, “I made a difference” is to have lived well.
You find the thing you love and you do it for YOU. Anything else is just noise.
